t: Amazon has launched its own fashion brand, but is it any good?
s: September 5, 2017 - Amazon has launched its debut own-brand fashion line, entitled Find. This isn't the first time that the online store has dabbled in fashion – it sells a number of high-street labels on its site, from Warehouse to New Look – but this marks a concerted effort to truly flex its fashion retail ...
